title: World Champions Collection unveiled at Silverstone: an F1 car for every title-winner
summary: Marking 75 years of Formula 1, the 2025 Silverstone Festival has assembled an F1 car for each world champion in an unprecedented showcase

qa_pairs.question: What year marks the 75th anniversary of Formula 1?
Where was the World Champions Collection unveiled?
What is the significance of the 2025 Silverstone Festival?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It showcases an F1 car for every world champion.
wrong_options: It celebrates the latest season's winner.
It features a race between current teams.
